'''''Vinyar Tengwar 1''''' is the first issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|1|2}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Chart of Body Parts in Quenya" — Tom Loback

* "A Report from Mythcon XIX" — Jorge Quiñónez
* "Basic Elvish: The Names of the Numbers in Elvish" — Jorge Quiñónez
* "Elvish Poetry: The Ring Poem in Quenya" — trans. Jorge Quiñónez and Christopher Gilson
* "''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'', Volume II: A Hoax?" — Jorge Quiñónez
